message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale. I think it's really valuable, so I'm starting the price at $160. What do you think?
Hi Alice, $160 is a bit high for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I can only go up to $80. What do you think?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer.  I understand your position, but $160 is based on the value I place on this product.  To make this work, I could go as low as $140.  Let me know what you think.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm still only able to go up to $80.  This is my final offer, as I can get the product for that price from someone else.  Let me know if you are willing to accept it.
